Caustic.h

This file defines the published interface for talking to the Caustic Renderer.  This include is usually the top level include that clients will use.

Caustic
namespace
Caustic
RenderCtxFlags
namespace
RenderCtxFlags

Defines flags for setting various render modes

IRenderCtx

Defines the main interface for setting various features in the renderer
